title: Client error
body:
For some reason sometimes i cant log in on my account..
It says Login status.
           Logging on...
And after 2 mn it says Error..
And when i log in it says..
Unknown Error..
An unknown error has occurred..

How i can fix that?

replies.body:
If the issue is intermittent as it sounds like it may be, it's very likely to be an issue with network routing to the login servers. Sometimes certain local network configurations can also affect your ability to reach the login platform, so the guide that *Rineyy* linked is a great place to start. 

Let me know if you continue to see issues after working through those steps.

We definitely don’t want you to miss the party, so here’s the security pass to the [Login Platform.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)
